about_the_game:
Grow your lil' tribe of goblins by mutating them, feeding them weird stuff and helping them battle other creatures in this cute Turn based Auto-Battler

You will gather equipment, choose best upgrades and lead them trough a randomly generated timeline so that they can survive and carve out a little cozy place for themselves in this fantasy world.

You start the game by getting a weak little goblin, that you will equip with dingy gear.

Over time by growing your tribe and sending it to battles you will gather gold and life essence form other creatures, that you will spend on upgrades and gear.

Mutate them.

Feed them good stuff and bad stuff. ( Did i hear poisonous slop cooking? )

Gain blessings and trinkets.

Use your dungeon core abilities during these battles.
Every encounter will move time forward by a day.

As the time passes the map changes and new encounters show up, you will have to find the balance between events, visiting traveling merchants and high risk battles with units that sometimes are stronger than your nest.

Drag back some loot from these encounters and you might be able to craft some new items by fusing scrap together in the Magic Forge.


This gloomy world could use some more green in it!

name: Gobocore
short_description: Roguelite Turn Based Auto-Battler about Growing your lil' tribe of goblins. Smash. Evolve. Eat things. Survive.
